## Function: `getDomainOccurrence()`

### Purpose

Calculates mean occurrence at the domain level.

### Usage

```{r}
#| echo: true
#| eval: false
getDomainOccurrence()
```

### Output

### Purpose

#| echo: true
#| eval: false
